branchCategory.name: MHM-X6400, Magnet Gripper
branchCategory.description: <p> Series MHM is a magnetic gripper that can be used in place of vacuum cups or grippers when holding a metallic workpiece. Position sensors can be mounted on all 4 sides and can be mounted on 3 sides.</p>
